insert into sign (begin_sign_time, s_id, c_name, c_location, is_sign, sign_time, t_name, t_id, sign_num, s_class, open_id) values (#{beginSignTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{sId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isSign,jdbcType=BIT}, #{signTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{tName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{signNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sClass,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sign set begin_sign_time = #{beginSignTime,jdbcType=DATE}, s_id = #{sId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, c_name = #{cName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_location = #{cLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_sign = #{isSign,jdbcType=BIT}, sign_time = #{signTime,jdbcType=DATE}, t_name = #{tName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_id = #{tId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sign_num = #{signNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, s_class = #{sClass,jdbcType=BIGINT}, open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sign_id = #{signId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select sign_id, begin_sign_time, s_id, c_name, c_location, is_sign, sign_time, t_name, t_id, sign_num, s_class, open_id from sign where sign_id = #{signId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
